Meeting Memos:

Meeting Memo

Summary:
Team reviewed completed work (Asana & Snowflake connectors, HubSpot bug fix, Intercom progress) and set priorities for the coming week. They agreed to build new Fireflies and Attio connectors next, hand off Gongâ€™s rollout and blog promotion to Chandler, and finish Intercom production setup. Ciro will merge and publish the Intercom app, Jonathas is finishing Trello incremental scrape and will open a Snowflake support ticket on rate limits, and Konrad will deploy the HubSpot fix. The group will keep Cycle tracking for one more week to gauge usefulness, and backlog tasks will be chipped away as capacity allows.

Notes:

Connector Progress & Recent Wins:
  - Asana and Snowflake connectors finished and live
  - Gong connector approved and listed
  - HubSpot 10K-result pagination bug fixed and merged

Intercom Connector:
  - End-to-end tests successful; minor article/help-center bugs found
  - Needs production app creation on Intercom Developer Hub (icon, description, metadata) before flag enabled

Trello Enhancements:
  - Webhook approach replaced by incremental scrape for reliability
  - Documentation updated about service-account approach
  - Incremental scrape expected to finish today

Snowflake Cortex Limits:
  - Rate-limit hits during eval scripts; largely a Snowflake setting
  - Plan to open support ticket and document limit-increase process

Upcoming Connectors:
  - Fireflies (GraphQL) and Attio selected as next priority due to strategic customer demand
  - Custom Data connector discussed; pricing & file-transform considerations noted

Backlog & Deployment:
  - Chandler on call this week; will push promotion PR and connector health-check tasks
  - Ciro to pick up backlog items after Intercom work
  - Cycles tracking will stay one more week, then reevaluate

Action Items:
  - description='Merge Intercom connector to master and create production app on Intercom Developer Hub' due_date=None assignee='Ciro'
  - description='Roll out Gong connector (soft launch & blog promotion)' due_date=None assignee='Chandler'
  - description='Deploy HubSpot pagination & refresh-token fixes to production' due_date=None assignee='Konrad'
  - description='Complete Trello incremental scrape implementation' due_date=None assignee='Jonathas'
  - description='Build Fireflies connector (initial research & scoping)' due_date=None assignee='Konrad'
  - description='Build Attio CRM connector (initial research & scoping)' due_date=None assignee='Jonathas'
  - description='Open Snowflake support ticket about increasing Cortex query limits and document process' due_date=None assignee='Jonathas'
  - description='Evaluate usefulness of Cycle tracking; decide to keep or drop after this week' due_date=None assignee='Chandler'
